ModMetaData.name: Milkable Muffalo 1.5 - Forked
ModMetaData.author: tiagorbrodrigues
ModMetaData.description:
Make Muffalo milkable again ! Muffalo give 8 milk every day. ___________________________________________________
IMPORTANT It's an updated version of an existing mod, i claim no ownership of the mod.
This version may be taken down by request from the original author.
The original author is free to use this mod to update their own. ___________________________________________________
Original mod (1.4 and earlier): Steam Workshop: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019852283
